ygData.subject: Perhaps the pole IS in a shop somewhere. Lets start looking...
ygData.msgSnippet: With all the combinations that we have tried, perhaps the collapsable fishing pole *IS* in a shop somewhere. The graphic is the same one used for a regular
ygData.messageBody:
With all the combinations that we have tried, perhaps the collapsable fishing pole *IS* in a shop somewhere. The graphic is the same one used for a regular fishing pole, I could see how it would easily be over looked.

Lets shift gears and start hunting, put up where you have looked on the board and we will scout the planet for this sucker...

Cheers,

FizzWizz of tunare
